description: Aspose.Cells for .NET is a spreadsheet programming component that allows software developers to manipulate and convert spreadsheet files from within their own applications. A combination of APIs and GUI controls, Aspose.Cells for .NET speeds up Microsoft Excel programming and conversion.
releaseNotes:
New Features
(CELLSNET-44154)- Support reading/Writing query table. 
(CELLSNET-44196)- Provide the ability to detect what column is filtered and which value to be filtered by on GridWeb interface 
Enhancements
(CELLSNET-44195)- File is opened in Protected View after conversion to XLS file format 
(CELLSNET-44182)- Cells find with custom formatting works in older version but not in newer version 
Bugs
(CELLSNET-44187)- Cell values are incorrectly replaced with # when converted to HTML 
(CELLSNET-44161)- Aspose.Cells generated XLSX causes Excel 2007 to repair the spreadsheet 
(CELLSNET-44063)- Pivot table loses header's order after working with input file 
(CELLSNET-44215)- Save to pdf showing extraneous data to the right of the table 
(CELLSNET-44201)- Issue regarding unsupported chars indices in CHAR formula 
(CELLSNET-44193)- Slanted cell shading is not correctly rendering to PDF 
(CELLSNET-44213)- Saving Picture from Worksheet results in slightly different image 
(CELLSNET-44192)- Category labels at the top of the chart are right aligned instead of left aligned 
(CELLSNET-44240)- Issue with renaming a named range 
(CELLSNET-44239)- Cell.ContainsExternalLink return true if formula is =WEEKNUM 
(CELLSNET-44231)- Resaving the spreadsheet corrupts the result 
(CELLSNET-44222)- Workbook with macros gets corrupted with version 8.7.0 
(CELLSNET-44220)- Setting the WorkbookSettings.Password property corruptes the resultant spreadsheet 
(CELLSNET-44218)- Re-saving the XLSX renames the xl\embeddings\oleObject1.bin file 
(CELLSNET-44214)- Copy Range does not keep ListObject settings 
(CELLSNET-44203)- Formula referencing is different across 8.6.2 and 8.7.0 for Worksheet.Copy operation 
Exceptions
(CELLSNET-44241)- System.IndexOutOfRangeException at Cells.ImportData 
(CELLSNET-44226)- System.ArgumentException at Workbook.Save while saving in ODS format 
(CELLSNET-44225)- Exception: "Invalid text of the defined name." occurred while copying Worksheet 
(CELLSNET-44223)- NullReferenceException when loading a specific XLSX file 
(CELLSNET-44212)- NullReference exception on opening the sourc excel file 
(CELLSNET-44204)- CellsException: Font size is out of range, at Workbook ctor
summary: Aspose.Cells for .Net is a class library for Excel document processing
title: Aspose.Cells for .NET
